user_sentiment: neutral to positive - satisfied with review completion
execution_quality: The agent efficiently handled the transition, acknowledging the reviewer's completion message and coordinating the shutdown process without errors or delays.
work_category: Team coordination and graceful shutdown of a code review teammate after completion of assigned tasks.
summary: The agent successfully managed team coordination during a structured review workflow, receiving completion notification from reviewer-1 and facilitating graceful shutdown. follow_up_pattern: Team lead initiated shutdown of reviewer teammate after it completed assigned review tasks and reported findings; normal end-of-task workflow.
